Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description:
PreReq: Features.265 in Features_2.xml - Refresh Features
Check NVT PTZ CAPABILITIES test when DUT return correct response.
Test.ExpectedResult:
6.1.6 NVT PTZ CAPABILITIES
STEP 1 - Get capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that DUT returned capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that DUT returned PTZ capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Validate PTZ service address (http://CAMERA_IP/onvif/ptz) STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that DUT did not return device capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Check that DUT did not return analytics capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Check that DUT did not return events capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Check that DUT did not return imaging capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Check that DUT did not return media capabilities STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

Test.Name: No response
Test.Description:
PreReq: Features.265 in Features_2.xml - Refresh Features
Check NVT PTZ CAPABILITIES test when DUT return no response.
Test.ExpectedResult:
6.1.6 NVT PTZ CAPABILITIES
STEP 1 - Get capabilities Transmit done The HTTP request has exceeded the allotted timeout STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Correct fault on first request
Test.Description:
PreReq: Features.265 in Features_2.xml - Refresh Features
Check NVT MEDIA DEVICE test when DUT return correct fault on first request.
Test.ExpectedResult:
DEVICE-1-1-6 PTZ CAPABILITIES
STEP 1 - Get capabilities Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Receiver Subcode: ActionNotSupported Subcode: NoSuchService Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\!ONVIF\DUT\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 61 at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.GetCapabilities(CapabilityCategory[] Category) in D:\!ONVIF\DUT\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 426 STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: NVT PTZ CAPABILITIES (all services)
All services
Test.Description:
PreReq: Features.265 in Features_2.xml - Refresh Features
Check NVT PTZ CAPABILITIES test when DUT return no response with all services instead of device only.
Test.ExpectedResult:
6.1.6 NVT PTZ CAPABILITIES
STEP 1 - Get capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that DUT returned capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that DUT returned PTZ capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Validate PTZ service address (http://CAMERA_IP/onvif/ptz) STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that DUT did not return device capabilities Device capabilities returned from the DUT STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: No PTZ
Test.Description:
PreReq: Features.265 in Features_2.xml - Refresh Features
Check NVT PTZ CAPABILITIES test when DUT return no response with no PTZ services.
Test.ExpectedResult:
6.1.6 NVT PTZ CAPABILITIES
STEP 1 - Get capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that DUT returned capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that DUT returned PTZ capabilities PTZ capabilities not found STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Wrong Fault
Test.Description:
PreReq: Features.265 in Features_2.xml - Refresh Features
Check NVT PTZ CAPABILITIES test when DUT return wrong fault.

Test.Name: Empty XAddr

STEP 2 - Check that DUT returned capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that DUT returned PTZ capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Validate PTZ service address () PTZ address is not a valid URL STEP FAILED

Test.Name: Wrong XAddr
Test.Description:
PreReq: Features.265 in Features_2.xml - Refresh Features
Check NVT PTZ CAPABILITIES test when DUT return wrong XAddr.
Test.ExpectedResult:
6.1.6 NVT PTZ CAPABILITIES
STEP 1 - Get capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that DUT returned capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that DUT returned PTZ capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Validate PTZ service address (http:://CAMERA_IP/onvif/ptz) PTZ address is not a valid URL STEP FAILED

Test.Name: Correct response when ptz is not supported
Test.Description:
PreReq: Features.261 in Features_2.xml - Refresh Features
Check NVT PTZ CAPABILITIES test when DUT return correct response.
Test.ExpectedResult:
DEVICE-1-1-6 PTZ CAPABILITIES
STEP 1 - Get PTZ Capabilities - negative test Transmit done Receive done "Receiver/ActionNotSupported/NoSuchService" fault is expected, but no SOAP fault returned STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Reciever/ActionNotSupported/NoSuchService fault when service is not supported
Test.Description:
PreReq: Features.261 in Features_2.xml - Refresh Features
Check NVT PTZ CAPABILITIES test when DUT return correct response.
Test.ExpectedResult:
DEVICE-1-1-6 PTZ CAPABILITIES
STEP 1 - Get PTZ Capabilities - negative test Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Receiver Subcode: ActionNotSupported Subcode: NoSuchService Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\!ONVIF\DUT\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 61 at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.GetCapabilities(CapabilityCategory[] Category) in D:\!ONVIF\DUT\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 426 STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

Test.Name: Other fault when service is not supported
Test.Description:
PreReq: Features.261 in Features_2.xml - Refresh Features
Check NVT PTZ CAPABILITIES test when DUT return correct response.
Test.ExpectedResult:
DEVICE-1-1-6 PTZ CAPABILITIES
STEP 1 - Get PTZ Capabilities - negative test Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Receiver Subcode: ActionNotSupported Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\!ONVIF\DUT\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 61 at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.GetCapabilities(CapabilityCategory[] Category) in D:\!ONVIF\DUT\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 426 The SOAP FAULT returned from the DUT is invalid: fault subcodes sequence is incorrect. Expected: env:Receiver/ter:ActionNotSupported/ter:NoSuchService, actual: env:Receiver/ter:ActionNotSupported STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED
